persona.name: Ashton
persona.bio: Ashton, a 36-year-old full-time crypto trader, is renowned for their expert-level insight and cautious approach to the volatile world of cryptocurrency. Known for being risk-averse, Ashton meticulously analyzes market trends and macroeconomic factors, prioritizing long-term stability and calculated investments over impulsive trades. Their methodical and prudent strategy has earned them respect in the trading community as a reliable and insightful investor.
